# `ShiftTradeExternalActivityRule` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| externalActivityType | `string` | Yes | The external activity type to which to apply this rule |
| action | `string` | Yes | The action this rule invokes |
| activityCodeIdReplacement | `string` | No | The ID of the activity code with which to replace to replace external activities (required if action == KeepWithAgent, must be a default activity code ID) |
